I love these pruning shears. The really big deal is having handles that are comfortable AND small enough for my hands. The normal sized pruners (I was using my dads) were too big and fatigue my hand after maybe 15 minutes of use. The handles on these smaller pruners also have a nice grip  a nice rubber hold that doesnt slip.The blades are sharp and precise. You can tell that these are well-made and aligned properly just by looking at them straight from the packaging. The little locking mechanism is firm but easy to operate and is a good safety feature because it stays wherever you position it without slipping back and forth. .I pruned some uneven sprouts from the Yews in front of my moms house, which tend to pop up unevenly between hedge trims. Yews have a firm stem and these shears cut through them like butter. Theyre also excellent for indoor plants.Its clear that these pruners will be around for the long haul. Theyre that nice and the price is excellent for these. Really excellent.Recommend.I received a low- or no-cost sample in exchange for my honest opinion. I do not automatically provide four- or five-star reviews when I receive a free or no-cost item as is evident in my review history. I am not compensated for my reviews.

This scarf is so pretty and the little owls are adorable. Im going to give this to my tween-aged niece who is just getting into fashion but still kind of likes kid stuff. The colors on this are cheery and bright without being too much. Also, the fact that this is an infinity scarf makes this seem more like its a grown-up girls scarf so shell love it even more.The fabric is such a nice quality gauzy viscose. Its super easy to care for and it drapes beautifully.Hand wash, no wringing, hang dry.Recommend.I received a low- or no-cost sample in exchange for my honest opinion. I do not automatically provide four- or five-star reviews when I receive a free or no-cost item as is evident in my review history. I am not compensated for my reviews.

WOW!  This is simply a stunning film (not sure if this comes in an English version, but my copy was in French with English subtitles)!  Powerful and nuanced, with great acting and story line.  I won't go into details like so many have before here, but suffice it to say that it is a story about how 2 completely different people randomly meet in a quiet French town, and feed off each other's differences with a curiosity and fascination.  They are polar opposites, yet come together with a mind blowing ending that turns fate upside down!  A 'must see'!

This is truly one of the best films of recent times.  I won't convey the story line (it's been written many times already here), but it is a hardscrabble journey where love ultimately wins out over gold.  The acting is excellent and believable, and the the many scenes of hardship, poverty, and crime provide a proper canvas for this tale.  There is a lot of empathy felt the 2 main protagonists here.  Ultimately, true love reigns supreme, which also makes it a 'feel good' movie.  The clever interspersed cutting between Jamal's appearance on the popular game show 'Who Wants To Be A Millionaire' (Indian version), and the unfolding of his story which supports the successive answers he gets all correct is pure cinematic genius.  Do not miss this film!

This is one of hard rock/metal's signature moments in time!  With the great Don Dokken and George Lynch 'firing on all cylinders', they crafted some killer, melodic tunes here, that stand the test of time.  As a Dokken fan, I equally love 'Tooth And Nail', 'Under Lock And Key', and 'Back For The Attack'.  All 3 are top notch albums within the genre, and George Lynch plays perfect metal guitar to boot.  His ungodly great riffs, lead, and biting tone are the stuff of legend!  If you love quality 'old school' hard rock/metal, don't miss this classic.

Are you kidding ME?!  You insert this into your XBOX 360, and NO tutorial?!  How is an absolute newcomer to this 'game' supposed to figure it out?  After a family friend who knows Minecraft came over to show us what it's all about, I couldn't believe how bad the graphics were!  Everything is square and reminds me of 8-bit PC graphics circa 1981!  I almost died of boredom sitting through an hour of this nonsense!  This 'game' is a cure for insomnia!  'Minecraft' is the video game equivalent of watching paint dry!

We have over 3,000 CD's and LP's in our vast collection.  My wife must have obtained this CD in a bargain bin, because from the get go, I wanted to toss this drivel against the wall and shatter it into a million pieces!  This isn't even good punk rock!  The songs are forgettable, low-fi, nonsensical meanderings!  This is, quite possibly, the worst recording in my collection!  'Nuff said.

This is a great compilation of early Depeche Mode!  You won't find any songs from later on in their career, because this came out in the mid 80's.  Best of all, the recording on this CD is very dynamic with great 'air', and not compressed or limited in any way (Google: 'The Loudness Wars').  This is the way Depeche was meant to be heard!

This flick was a good 'bargain bin' purchase!  I found it for three bucks, and frankly, the movie delivered!  Sure it was cheesy, but I really liked the abandoned Chernobyl setting (Pripyat), and the fact that we never really learned what it was that attacked Yuri and those kids.  The obvious conclusion one can draw is that the radiation levels mutated some humans that stuck around that forbidden area into flesh eating zombies!  The bottom line is that it was entertaining, and kept me on the edge of my seat.  But I have to tell you, the ending was a bit ridiculous.  If you don't pay full price for this DVD, it's worth a look.

Great rock album!  Deep Purple is one of the most respected, influential rock bands, and this 1984 release proves why!  Great songs, riffs, lead, vocals... it has it all!  Ritchie Blackmore, as usual, is amazing!

My 10 year old recently surprised us, and asked mom and dad for a prayer book!  We of course said "sure", so we went to a major big box book retailer and found this nice book.  It has prayers for all circumstances and seasons, and seems like a general Christian book that befits all sub-genres of Christianity.  So whether you're Greek Orthodox, Catholic, Protestant, Lutheran, 'born again', etc., this is a 'one prayer book fits all' book that you and your children will love.  And it is well illustrated too.

I just can't take this band seriously.  Yes, I know it's fun, understated, punk rock geared for 'yuppies', but if you're over 21 and/or have finally left your mom and dad's attic or basement, move on.  Time if finite, and there are so many other great bands to listen to!

This is OK milk chocolate.  It's certainly not bad, but it just does not compare to the world's best milk chocolate, such as Cadbury's, Milka, or Lacta (Greece).  It is not creamy or flavorful enough, and it contains hints of dark chocolate taste and some bitterness as well.  Of course, YMMV, and you may very well like it.

These are excellent lens cleaning tissues, with multi-purpose use.  I not only use them for my glasses, but use them to periodically clean the 3 large projection lenses inside my rear-projection HDTV.  Every year or so, dust gets inside my TV, and lands on the projection lenses, which blurs and weakens the picture a bit.  Keeping these important projection lenses clear insures that the video quality is similar to when the TV set was new.  I highly recommend these lens cleaning tissues!

CARMEX is easily one of my favorite lip balm moisturizers.  Winter almost always gives me chapped, painful lips, and I use CARMEX to effectively moisten them, as well as the area around my fingernails and elbow joints too.  So in that regard, it really does have a multi-purpose use.  I believe the product also contains a bit of analgesic, which is great in helping to quell soreness or pain that often comes with chapped, parched lips.  This is truly a great, time-tested product that works for me!

This is a great rock album, by an all-star band that features greats like Steve Vai and Greg Bissonette.  It is highly listenable and even 'playful', with hints of funk, and varying time progressions too.  The well-defined and forward bass lines are killer too!  Diamond Dave is the perfect 'foil' for all that is going on musically on this great release.

THANK YOU 'SmartyPants' for a superior, healthier multivitamin that actually tastes great and contains Omega-3 as well!  I am also very pleased that this vitamin does not contain and GMO's or artificial sweeteners!  I am in my 50's, and my doctor told me that I have a Vitamin D and Omega-3 deficiency.  I was recently diagnosed with a 30% carotid artery blockage on both sides, which has impelled me to eat better and to take multivitamins.  I also bought the children's version for my 10 year old daughter.  A truly great product!

These are SOOO good, and healthy for you as well!  The best (tastiest) figs are from the Mediterranean region, which includes Greece and Turkey.  These are Turkish figs, organically grown, and NON-GMO verified (have the symbol on the package).  There are no chemicals or additives, with no sugar or anything else added.  These soft-dried figs literally melt in your mouth, and are addictive!

Greatly diminished quality has become EPIDEMIC in these United States, and I presume most everywhere else too!  All the great, well-known manufacturers like 'Fruit Of The Loom', 'Hanes', etc. have greatly cheapened their men's briefs lately!  Ditto regarding my 'Calvin Klein' briefs.  Initially, they fit well, and provided decent support for the family jewels.  But after only a few washes, the strength and elasticity of the bands wore thin, and they became loose and uncomfortable.  Even the cotton itself did not seem as supportive.  Shame, really.  At this point, I am so tired of searching for something as simple as a decent pair of men's briefs, but this has surprisingly become impossible!

This review is for a single 5 oz. bag of 'Sea Salt Caramel' popcorn I found at TJ MAXX.  This is quite possibly, some of the finest tasting popcorn I have ever had!  Lots of bold caramel and butter flavor without the overdone saltiness of so many other brands.  I've never heard of the '479 Degrees' brand before, but am glad I have recently.  And, best of all, the corn is NON-GMO!  So I know i'm getting healthy corn.

My Border Collie mix really loves his new toy!  He is a 'chewer', and so far has not demolished this toy, as he does with others.  And we can play 'tug of war' with it too!  We are both very happy with this durable toy.

I found this Blu-Ray DVD for 3 dollars at a local big box retailer's 'bargain bin'.  I could follow-up this sentence with 'nuff said, but I did want to say that at least the premise and story of Apollo 18 is very interesting.  What IF there was a secret Apollo 18 program, kept top secret, that somehow went awry?!  Of course, there probably wasn't, but it is interesting fodder for a unique screenplay.  There were parts where this film was interesting, but the 'actual footage' style in which it was filmed came across as extremely corny and ridiculous.  I found myself trying to stay awake throughout most of this movie.  I think that if this was a big Hollywood production, it would have been more entertaining.  Ron Howard or Steven Spielberg, are you listening?

I have purchased this exact shoe horn out of necessity at a local shoe store.  All four of them broke after a few weeks of use!  The plastic is cheap and tends to crack and break, even with minimal stress and pressure, it seems!  So, I am desperately searching for a long metal shoe horn that will last.  If anyone knows where I can find one, please contact me!  Thanks.

Does 'Evol' even test these products before releasing them?!  I was extremely dissapointed upon trying this product that I purchased at 'Target' today!  The taste was very bland, with no hint of the caramelized onions in there, and the taco was so soft that it literally fell apart when I tried to pick it up!  I had to use a knife and fork to eat this thing.  Very dissapointed.

These things are fantastic, and work very well!  They saved me from having to spend additional money on new individual blinds.  This is an example of a utilitarian product that delivers on it's promise!  I'll buy more just to have them around.

This seems like an OK hard drive, and it is amazing that you get 2 TB (more like 1.8 TB) of storage in such a small package these days.  I was a bit dissapointed that there is no case whatsoever bundled with this hard drive.  I own about 4 other portable external drives, and they all came with a simple padded, zippered protective case.  This is my first USB 3.0 external drive, and it took about 2 hours and 10 minutes to transfer 267 GB of files (uninterrupted, in one folder) from my Dell Win 7 PC to this Seagate external drive (transfer speed was about 36 to 36.3 MB/second using USB 3.0).  I honestly thought it would take a lot faster though.  Is this considered a normal USB 3.0 transfer rate, or does it sound as if something is wrong with my drive?  Wondering if some of you experts can comment below.

What was AT&T thinking when they released this poorly designed phone?!  The handset tab is flawed bigtime, since the phone won't even stay on the wall!  It falls off all the time, and upon inspection of the handset tab, I can see why.  It seems that the handset tab does not jut out enough to keep the phone hanging on the wall properly.  Of course, there is a chance I got a bad one, but nonetheless, I just don't have the time to return it to the store, and I probably threw out the receipt anyway, thinking I could trust an AT&T product.

This is a very cool, eye-catching RUSH shirt, from their 'Hemispheres' era, back in the days when real rock was king!  When vocalists could actually sing and rock musicians were prolific masters at playing their instruments!  I really enjoy wearing it when I ride my classic Yamaha 2-stroke RD350 motorcycle from the 70's!  Between the vintage bike and the vintage rock shirt, I get lots of attention and 'thumbs up'!

Snyder's SWEET & SALTY salted caramel pretzels, WHERE have you been all my life?!?!?  Beyond delectable!  One of the most perfect combinations of sweet and salted i've ever tasted, hands down!  Throw some in your favorite vanilla custard or ice cream, and you will be in seventh heaven!  Well executed Snyder's... WELL EXECUTED!

We got this for our daughter's 10th birthday, and she LOVES it!  The product is well made, and is essentially already put together, except for a few easy insert panels, which takes 2 minutes.  We 'shopped around' for it, because prices vary considerably from retailer to retailer, whether online or 'brick and mortar'.  The counter lights up in pink 'neon', and the little jukebox plays 50's and 60's pop music.  Great for American Girl or Our Generation dolls.

I'm sure this is excellent chain lube, BUT the problem is that it's a pain in the tush to apply without the stuff squirting all over the place!  The foam lube shoots out like a fire engine water hose, and it's hard to control!  Now my chain is properly lubed, but so is my garage floor and my rear tire!  If there is some way for the manufacturer to make the foam come out SLOWLY, that would be fantastic.

Hitman Pro is one of the best spyware/malware/virus identification and removal tools, yes, but I am turned off by the fact that the license is only for ONE PC!  Who the heck uses just one PC in their household?!  Most people have 3, 4, or 5 PC's, including their childrens' computers.  If they had any biz sense, they would allow use for up to 3 PC's for the price you pay, like many other companies do!  For this reason alone, I will look elsewhere to protect my 3 PC's for a reasonable price!

A seminal 'rock' release, and the remastering is fantastic!  These guys defied classification, and could play their hearts out.  One of the most musical jams in rock history, with fantastic musicianship and chops.  A classic!

This is a very cool 'mason jar' (it's really plastic, not glass) that changes colors very nicely!  I was pleasantly surprised by how well it changes colors (one fades into another), and how deep and bright the many colors are.  This looks awesome in a dark room!  It has a setting for indefinite on, or a 20 minute timer, as well as 'demo mode'.  Just as a goof, I placed one inside my car (after sundown), parked towards the end of my driveway (i'm on a dark street), and sat down while passersby gawked at, and made comments about 'that colorful glow' emanating from my vehicle!  I must have really been bored that night...

I'll get right to the point.  America doesn't hold a candle to Europe when it comes to fine, creamy, superior tasting chocolates!  While the idea for a bacon and chips milk chocolate bar is great (i've tasted others too), Hammond's milk chocolate is just plain mediocre at best, and can't compare to the likes of Perugina or Lacta (both European).  Even Cadbury blows it away.  So any attempt at making this specialty chocolate bar taste great is negated by the uninspiring and forgettable taste of this milk chocolate.  Sorry.

The 'Hefty' brand touch-lid, 13.3 gallon trash cans (the come in different colors; mine is black) are FANTASTIC, well thought out, well-made products!  Throughout the years, i've had way more expensive, foot-operated stainless steel trash bins, and many malfunctioned or stopped working completely within a short period of time.  Not so with these Hefty cans.  I've always had the best luck with these inexpensive, no-nonsense touch-lid cans, and they are the best at containing smells too.  Kitchen size, 13 gallon trash bags fit perfectly around the lip of the can as well (unlike some other cans).  We had our last Hefty touch-lid for at least 5 years, until I ran over the lid by mistake (left the can and lid on the driveway to wash/hose it down, which I do twice a year)!  I know it's kind of strange reviewing a kitchen trash bin, BUT I considered that I use this product several time a day.  It's important that it works, and works well.

I am really getting tired of having to spend my precious time online, giving negative reviews for once decent products that have been cheapened and 'cost cut'!  This is becoming epidemic in these United States, and the consumer needs to wake up and demand better quality from these ripoff companies!  Just a few years ago, companies like Hanes or Fruit Of The Loom used quality materials and manufacturing to build skivvies that actually FIT well, provided support for the 'family jewels', and did not sag or rip.  Not anymore!  The quality has plummeted noticeably, and I cannot seem to find underwear that fits and supports well!  Even the cheap elastic waist bands lost their elasticity and strength within 2 to 3 wears! These companies should be ashamed of themselves!  If anyone knows of any company that sells well made, thicker cotton, 'old school' men's briefs, PLEASE let me know!

I *finally* found a healthy, proper multivatamin (with Omega 3's) for my 9 year old daughter!  I had been using 'Nature Made' gummies, which is OK, but this excellent multivitamin is a cut above.  I've read online reviews and spoken to health and nutrition experts, and many had mentioned the 'Smarty Pants' brand as being the safest and best made vitamin.  My wife had also received samples from this company in her 'Birchbox' or 'Conscious Box' (I don't recall which one), and we liked what we read on the ingredients list.  And my child LOVES the taste!  My only gripe would be that the container states that the dosage is 4 per day.  I give her 3 a day, which will make the product last longer, and in my opinion, still gives her a good dose of vitamins and Omega 3.  In the past, i've had 2 doctors that told me that you don't need multivitamins every day, and to just take them every other day.  So I figure 3 instead of 4 is OK.

I've used many 'super glues' before, including the original.  I really like this 3M version a lot, because it works, is priced right, and I don't waste any product given the efficient 'single-use' mini tubes.  I've used this glue for many projects, and my latest one was re-fitting and gluing the pieces together on a very unstable portable clothes rack that was not manufactured well.  The rack is now very stable and works well!  Scotch 'super glue' comes to the rescue once again!

I needed a decent pair of reading glasses ('cheaters'), and my wife picked me up this pair from 'OfficeMax'.  I am very dissapointed.  I've had many pairs of reading glasses over the years, and this pair is not 'optically correct', as the product tag states.  Looking through these glasses, images don't seem natural, and I get a slight headache from doing so.  The frame was also slightly bent when I got these, and I must have spent about 15 minutes trying to bend them back to a comfortable, correct shape.  In addition, the lenses do not clean as easily as other glasses I have, and smudges seem hard to get rid of at times.  I must therefore conclude that these are lower quality 'cheaters', and not worth the hassle and dissapointment.  I will have to donate these, or just toss them away.

My daughter is going into the 4th grade, and is very excited about using her ZUCA bag this year!  Considering all the things kids put into their school backpacks, and how heavy and unwieldy they can get, the ZUCA bag is a great, logical solution!  It even has a special pouch for an iPAD, Kindle, etc.!  Parents, if you are reading this, a ZUCA bag for your kids' school stuff is a great solution, and it can of course be used for years.  I would not be surprised if my daughter uses this bag through her high school and/or college years!  It's that sturdy, practical, and well-made!

SHAME on you Logitech!  You've officially joined the ranks of companies that have chosen to cheapen and lower the quality of your products (at least this mouse)!  I've had many Logitech products over the years, and several of their 'mice'.  Compared to the last few i've used (their model M305), this M317 'limited edition' is a bona-fide P.O.S.!  It doesn't track nearly as well as the M305, and feels very imprecise!  I don't feel good using it with my Win 7 PC!  I had the utmost confidence in Logitech products all these years, which is why I threw away my receipt and 'blister pack' case.  So now I can't get my money back (Target).  Thanks Logitech.

This is an absolute STEAL in the world of audio!  Think about it.  A tubed preamplifer that will give you warm, sweet, euphonic tube sound that people lust after, for the price of an average dinner for two!  I hooked this up to a McIntosh MC162 amplifier and an Onkyo SACD player, in turn driving a pair of Magnepan MG12QR's, just 'for shitz and giggles', and was BLOWN AWAY by the sound!  You do not need to spend big bucks to get glorious tube sound!  This IS your ticket!

We (wife and I) have all The Connells' stuff on CD.  This debut release sounds a bit different than the rest, but is excellent and honest, nonetheless.  The songs are very well written, with some excellent R.E.M. or The Church-like jingly-jangly guitar driven melodies, and the whole thing has a very British aura and feel to it.  Whether he knew it or not, their vocalist often sounds a bit like Morrissey and The Smiths, as someone else had mentioned here in a previous Amazon review.  This is not a bad thing, since anything by The Smiths is fantastic, IMHO.  That said, this is probably one of the all-time better debut rock/pop releases ever by an American band!

What a GREAT, well done, well acted movie!  Very moving story about the scattered and abusive life that Antwone Fisher experienced, before joining the military, and how he eventually found his long lost family, and ultimately, himself.  His was a painful, but necessary journey of self-discovery, where love overcomes hate!  Grab a box of 'Kleenex' while you're at it.  Derek Luke and Denzel Washington were absolutely stellar!  Don't miss this one!

Just an incredible 'album' (CD, MP3, whatever)!  The songs are highly original in every way.  Johnette has an incredible, powerful, heartfelt voice, and the band is running on all cylinders here.  Tight arrangements, with great musicianship (which is harder to find these days).  Track 6, "I Call It Love" is my fave.  Don't miss this one!  And remember, 'old is gold'!

This is one of the most gorgeous, sweeping, emotional pieces of music ever written, never mind as a soundtrack!  My dear, beautiful dad passed away recently, and left me a lot of music in the form of LP's.  The RCA Victor 'Orthophonic' LP vinyl was one of them, and I remember when he used to play this masterpiece on his classic, early 60's FISHER 500C receiver/amplifier!  The great, sweet sound created by that great classic tube equipment (with the highly regarded German Telefunken tubes in the preamp and final stages of the FISHER 500C) is something to be experienced at least once!  I cannot wait to restore his FISHER (which I inherited as well) in order to re-experience that glorious stereo tube sound with even better, more modern speakers!  The first LP I will play when I audition the newly restored equipment is this 'Exodus' soundtrack.

Panda Free Antivirus 2015 was just rated the BEST free antivirus by PC Magazine, and several impartial Information Technology testers on YouTube!  Detection and elimination rates are very high, and in some cases, perfect!  I have also read that this cloud-based Panda product outperforms many commercial antivirus software suites that one has to pay for!  In my specific case, I was getting sick and tired of paying a rapacious yearly renewal fee for my Norton360 antivirus (about 90 dollars!), when it was available online for much less!  One would thank that Symantec would charge a steady, loyal customer less for their product, not more.  So I removed (cancelled) Norton360 from 3 of my PC's, and installed Panda Free Antivirus 2015 on them.  I also continue to use Malwarebytes (a free anti-malware, anti-spyware software) as a second line of defense (I do periodic scans), and I have had no issues or infections.  Panda Free Antivirus 2015 is a highly effective, proven, free antivirus package, scans quickly, has a good simple interface, and is light on your PC's resources.  In short, it's perfect!

I am glad I finally got to listen to this incredible release!  My wife had it in her CD collection for years, and curiosity got the better of me recently.  Suffice it to say that this CD is incredible!  Who knew that Steve Kilbey could paint such gorgeous and moving sonic soundscapes!  To an extent, this reminds me of the great electronic composer Vangelis, but Kilbey obviously adds his own sonic signature to these compositions.  Get this CD, before you can't!  I would even buy the remaster if it comes out.

Peter Koppes is a guitar genius!  The man is a master craftsman of guitar created soundscapes and then some.  The songs here are trippy, progressive, well-crafted and deep.  Just the way I love my pop/rock music!  If you want to hear a masterful technician at work, but this CD.  'Caravan' is a mind blowingly gorgeous song.

This only works IF you can get past the top of your drain!  With our bathtub drain, it didn't work because the top of the drain contains a sort of permanent metal grate that prevented us from pushing this device in.  Before you buy this, make sure your drain is unobstructed so this tool can slide in easily.

This is a great release from MWP, and provides an insight into his brilliant musicianship.  Great songcraft, musicianship, and vocals, and a joy to listen to.  There is an excellent variety of music here, and Marty delves into many details of how this was conceived of and recorded in the thick liner notes that come with the CD.  In this day and age of anemic and watered-down pop and rock music, it is back-catalogue CD's like this one that carry the day!

The play tray works very well. It is easy to install and also easy to clean up which is always a nice thing. It is a sturdy play tray and so far our boy is enjoying it along with his new seat. Our only problem is that he is getting just a little too big as he is growing so fast. This will definitely be a keeper for our next expected boy!

I received these gloves at no cost for my review. They fit really well and are quite comfortable. They will serve the purposes I need them for nicely. I am very pleased with them. They look nice and are well made. I like them a lot. I ordered a  medium size and they were perfect for me.

I received my chicken feet too late for me to wear them with my Halloween costume which was a big bummer. They look okay but not as good or realistic as I had first thought. I guess I will have to save them for next year which was a disappointment as I had promised to dress like a chicken. They don't really look very much like any chicken feet that I have ever seen before so I guess I am just a bit unhappy with them.

I have liked all of the books in this series quite well. I was a little disappointed in that I really did miss the main characters, Sarah and Frank. I hope to see them in the next book. I was pleased with Felix and how he is reacting to some changes in his life. The story was good and the evil Una got what she deserved, I expect. Oh boy, was she mean to her mother! I enjoy the setting and the time frame in the city. It is a very readable series and I look forward to the next one.

I purchased this for our newest baby boy and he just crowed with delight when I sat him in it. He loves this floor seat. It is made from a really resilient material that is great. I am most pleased with this seat. Our boy is enjoying this seat tremendously. When we take him out of it, he gravitates toward it and wants back in it. We are having a bunch of fun with it. Great product. Love it.

I received this metal frame magnifying glass at no cost for my review. My husband suffers from the after effects from exposure to Agent Orange which really has damaged his eyesight enormously. He needs a lot of help just to read. This magnifying glass is proving to be extremely useful. It is just the right size for him to carry with him when he has to be away from home. It is also very attractive with the rosewood handle but that is not as important as the usefulness of the magnifying glass is to him. It helps him so much. We are very pleased with this magnifying glass. It helps me with the small print in the telephone book, too.  P.S. I have to add that the little tiny end of the handle is easily removed.

I have had this book for a very long time and have read it so many times to little people both at school and at home. It has always been a good one for a group of small children. We like the story and we especially like the pictures. It is a very pleasant book to share.

Our little fellow likes to feel the different textures in this Christmas book. He also likes to gnaw on the edges of the book which we discourage. He likes this book a lot and laughs at the pictures when we look at it and read the words. Board books like this one are great for little people. This one is a great favorite.

The very first thing our boy did was break the part on the little elephant that holds it in the play top. I had installed the elephant securely. The next thing I knew, he gave it a big yank and the little white holder pieces broke off and went flying over his head. Luckily, they did not hit anybody. I am not so sure about this play top now. I am reserving judgment and watching him carefully with it.

This book is a 'must' read in my opinion. It helped me so very much and has been so very meaningful to my family and me. The story is such a good one and really lifts you up as you get into the book. It will stay with you and make your days better. I am most thankful to the author of this book. You  won't be sorry that you read it. It is a keeper for your collection and will be one to read more than once.

Very pleasing illustrations and a whole lot of good information in this book for little people. I wish that it had been written when my girls were younger and we visited San Francisco. It would have been very helpful for us. I am glad to see it now and do recommend it for any family planning a trip with their youngsters to San Francisco. This is a very good book.
Lovely book with lovely illustrations. I would think this would be such a great book for young people to learn about Paris. I like it a lot and found this book to be most enjoyable.

I first bought this book for my sons about 39 years ago for one of their early Christmas gifts. I still have the worn out copy of the book. I will be giving some of my grandchildren copies of this book this year. My boys loved Poky Little Puppy and it meant so much to us. The story remains as good as ever. The illustrations are as wonderful. It is just a precious story that I cherish as I do the memory of that Christmas with my sons. This is an absolute keeper as far as I am concerned. I love it.

I received these lights for no cost for my review. They are extremely fragile but very pretty. They look really nice where they are displayed on my deck. I do like them a lot. Their fragility worries me just a little but so far everything has been just fine.

I would like for every young woman to read this book. It is an outstanding tribute to what can be done if you are willing to try hard and put forth your best effort. This is an amazing example of an American at her best. I love this lady and I love this book.

If you are a marshmallow lover, you will really go for this particular flavor. If you are not a marshmallow lover, you will not. It is really that simple. Personally, I am not a lover of marshmallow but my extended family definitely enjoy that flavor. For that reason, I will give these cookies four stars. I can't bring myself to do five stars simply because I don't like marshmallow in any shape or form. I did get these cookies for my gang and they were consumed almost immediately so that would tell all of you marshmallow fans out there something!

This is really a great way to introduce colors to little folks. I like this book a lot. I would especially want it for my youngster if planning a trip to New York. It would also be a good way to introduce New York, I think. It is a sturdy book which is always a good thing. It is colorful and has good, pertinent information in it without being overly wordy. I am very happy with this book for young people and do recommend it highly.

I love this book for some good 'one on one' time with a little person. Lift the flap books are a lot of fun and this one has some really good pictures to discuss in it. It is also a very good way to teach taking care of books with little folks. This is a good Santa Claus book and I have enjoyed having it with our little fellow. I would add that lift the flap books are not as good with larger groups of children as I have discovered in the past that everyone wants to be the person who lifts the flap and sometimes that causes problems.

This is such a cute book. We have already had a lot of fun reading Everyone Loves Bacon to our little people. We like the pictures and we like to talk about how the other foods feel about bacon. We do love bacon and this is a fun story that our children can relate to. We like pancakes with our bacon! Very good story.

For years I have said that Jan Brett was the most wonderful illustrator imaginable for children's books. I still say that. Her stories are great, too, of course but her illustrations are magical. The Turnip is no exception. She has done it again. I love sharing her books with little people. We always have so much to discuss about the pictures. I enjoy reading and looking at her books by myself as well. Jan Brett's books are always a treat and something to look forward to. The Turnip is definitely a keeper.

What could be better than a new bathrobe for the winter! This one is lovely. It does feel like a cloud. I guess I am wearing a cloud. It looks nice, feels nice and is beyond cozy. I love it. It feels better than any other bathrobe I have ever owned. The color is nice but the texture is the best thing imaginable.  I did receive this robe for review at no cost.

You should see our big puppy in his new harness. He looks so cute. It is comfortable for him to wear and we are having no problems with it. It looks really nice. It was easy and quick to put it on and we had no problems at all. I am very satisfied with it. I did receive it at no cost for my review. My puppy and I are most grateful.

We have already been using these pruning shears today and they are really working fabulously. They are just the right size for my hands to use with ease and comfort. They are quite sharp and have cut my shrubbery perfectly. I am most pleased with them and have plans for a lot more pruning tomorrow. I was very happy to receive these pruning shears for my review at no cost. They are great.

As I sit here typing my review, I am using my new wonderful flatworld pillow. It is great. I like it a lot. The pillow is extremely comfortable and a very nice size. I am planning on using it on my next car trip. I was very pleased to receive this pillow at no cost for my review.

We received this wig at no cost for our honest review. I got this wig for our youngest daughter who in the past has had several wigs to wear. This is the best one she has had so far. It has plenty of hair on it and hangs great. When she wears it, it does not scream to the world that she has a wig on.It looks quite natural and lovely. Great wig.

Quite frankly, being the chocolate lover that I am, I was a bit disappointed. I just didn't like these brownie batter oreos so much. I believe I will stick with the original ones. I received these lights at no cost to me for my review. These lights are very interesting and nicely made. I am using them near my front porch on one of my favorite shrubs. Oh how we love Maisy in our family. We are enjoying this 'airplane' book very much. Maisy is a delight and our youngest family member is thrilled with her. This little book is perfect for our little fellow. The colors are bright and cheerful and this is just the right size for our boy to hold. When we read to him, he pats the picture and points out where Maisy is. I repeat, we love Maisy.

Here is another book that I somehow missed over the years. My sister gave me an older advanced copy and I read it yesterday and last night. It is a terrific book that totally blew me away. I am in love with my hair!!!! So I was offered this purple rain semi permanent hair color for a great deal to try and share my honest opinion about it. So she didn't color my entire head but instead went in where she's been doing my highlights and did mostly purple rain and threw in a few of the blue. The first thing she noticed as a salon owner, was the vibrant color these had just on the application. Then, we both noticed the smell. It smells like fruit!! We think the purple is grape. Just amazing!! So we let it sit for about a half hour and rinsed out with cold water as directed. She saw it on the towel so told me not to sleep on white sheets, lol. Before it was dried, she kept saying how vibrant and bright this color is compared to any other colors and brands she's tried in all her years of styling hair. She dried my hair and we both stared at amazement. I am literally in love with my hair and she is going to start using this brand for colors. My hair smelled of grapes until my first wash a few days later and has been running in the shower each time I've washed it, which is expected since its a semi permanent color. The color has faded some but is still just as fabulous as it was almost 3 weeks ago. I definitely recommend this purple rain semi permanent grape scented hair color for anyone who wants an amazing hair color!!
